title: Economic Pressures Likely Will Be Catalyst for Even More In-House Tech Adoption | Legaltech News - Law.com
content: Economic Pressures Likely Will Be Catalyst for Even More In-House Tech Adoption | Legaltech News  Law.com
description: Even as the pandemic transformed the way legal operates, it didn't do enough to create a proactive shift toward tech use for many legal departments. Now, with prices rising and budgetary constraints, some expect increased automation even among the more stubborn companies.
